channel.title: Erro compiling/ making live patch
channel.description:
Generate code complete MODULE_PATHS=C:\Users\geert\Documents\axoloti-2.0.0\axoloti-factory\modules\brds processing module C:\Users\geert\Documents\axoloti-2.0.0\axoloti-factory\modules\brds make[1]: Entering directory 'C:/Users/geert/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/build/brds' linking brds.dbg.elf c:/program files (x86)/gnu tools arm embedded/7 2018-q2-update/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.3.1/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: cannot open linker script file axoloti_api_version.ld: No such file or directory collect2.exe: error: ld returned 1 exit status make[1]: Leaving directory 'C:/Users/geert/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/build/brds' make[1]: *** [C:\PROGRA~2\Axoloti\app\env/module-rules.mk:20: brds.dbg.elf] Error 1 make: *** [C:\Users\geert\Documents\axoloti-2.0.0\axoloti-factory\modules\brds/include.mk:15: C:\Users\geert\Documents\axoloti-2.0.0/build/brds/brds.elf] Error 2 Done compiling patch
I get this error with almost every brds component i try to use
Please help :-)

item.title: Erro compiling/ making live patch
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

Unfortunately, there is virtually no communication from the developer.

On GitHub, 2.0.0 says ‘pre-release’ and ‘may contain severe issues‘. The release notes for 2.0.0 also say the MI (mutable instrument) stuff doesn’t work.

On github, Axoloti-1.0.12-2 is marked ‘Latest Release’

It has been almost a year since Johannes put the 2.0.0 pre-release package on GitHub. I see little evidence this project is moving forward in any useful way.

Read full topic

item.title: Erro compiling/ making live patch
item.dc:creator: @gv2000
item.description:
@gv2000 wrote:

Ah ok I understand now.. but why are these not working brds modules available in version 2.0.. it's very difficult to know up front what works or not if the ones that don't work are still selectable/available in this version

Read full topic

item.title: Erro compiling/ making live patch
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

I think you misunderstood.

It is suggested that you completely remove Axoloti 2.0. And then, install Axoloti 1.0.12.
You will also need to downgrade the Axoloti firmware to the version that works with 1.0.12.

Read full topic

item.title: Erro compiling/ making live patch
item.dc:creator: @gv2000
item.description:
@gv2000 wrote:

Downgrading via de axoloti app does not work for me, nothing happens

Read full topic

item.title: Erro compiling/ making live patch
item.dc:creator: @gv2000
item.description:
@gv2000 wrote:

Thx for the quick answer..

Read full topic

item.title: Erro compiling/ making live patch
item.dc:creator: @AndrewChi
item.description:
@AndrewChi wrote:

The 'brds' modules don't work in Axoloti 2.0
Downgrade to the latest version of Axoloti 1 and it will work (along with some other modules!)

Read full topic
